sources.title: 3M Command Hooks Review
sources.summary: Comprehensive review of Command hooks across multiple applications, positive overall but light-duty focus

sources.summary: Critical review with balanced pros/cons, includes consumer failure scenarios and complaints

sources.summary: Official Command brand heavy-duty line (up to 16 lbs capacity)

sources.title: Weight Limit Complaints Research
sources.summary: Multiple sources confirming reliability issues, adhesive failure, and unsuitability for heavy/valuable items

sources.url: WebSearch: Command hooks vs screws garage storage durability
sources.title: Command vs Screw-in Hooks Comparison
sources.summary: Screws strongly preferred for garage storage durability, Command limited to lightweight items

sources.url: WebSearch: damage-free garage storage hooks heavy duty alternative Command
sources.title: Damage-Free Alternatives Research
sources.summary: Command max 15 lbs utility hooks, but market dominated by 50+ lb steel slatwall alternatives

primary_themes: damage-free benefit loved but weight capacity questioned
garage applications exist but not core use case
failure patterns: immediate, rapid, delayed, temperature-triggered
damage-free promise contradicted by paint/wallpaper damage reports

expanded_sources.title: 3M Command - Trustpilot Reviews
expanded_sources.summary: 168 reviews, 1.1/5 stars overall, 93% gave 1 star. Comprehensive failure documentation with named reviewers and dates.
key_findings: clock at 38% capacity fell after 12 hours

expanded_sources.title: Would someone tell me what I'm doing wrong with command strips?
expanded_sources.summary: Multi-year discussion thread documenting quality degradation over time
key_findings: products used 10 years ago very sticky, new ones won't stick at all
glue not as good as it once was

expanded_sources.title: Walmart Customer Reviews - Command Hooks/Strips
expanded_sources.summary: Multiple product review pages showing systematic failures across product line
key_findings: half hooks fell off with plain garland

expanded_sources.title: Do Command Strips Really Work? - Expert Analysis
expanded_sources.summary: Expert review with consumer feedback aggregation, 0.125/5 star rating
key_findings: polarized results: works perfectly or fails completely
success depends on unpredictable adhesive performance
lightweight items under 5 lbs failing unexpectedly

expanded_sources.context: Safety concerns with nursery items falling
